name: HEXslide
description:
The revolutionary new approach of the conventional sliding puzzle games.
The shape of the tiles makes the puzzle lot more fun!

Features:

- 8 level of difficulty
- 8 built in pictures
- 64 saved score
- Race mode, with 3 levels of difficulty
- 9 bonus picture, after race completion
- Use your photo as a new puzzle!
- Skin the user interface!
- Choose you control from 2 different style!
